task_description: In app camera, Take a photo of the current scene using the 3-second timer.
In app camera, Skip the sign-in process and use the map without signing in.
In app camera, Task-Oriented: Share the selected image by scrolling to find and selecting the 'Gmail' app from the list of available options.
In app camera, Adjust the flash setting to 'Auto' by clicking the 'More options' button and then clicking the flash icon.
In app camera, Share the current image to Google Drive.
In app camera, Task-Oriented: View the recently captured image, edit it to enhance its quality, and then share it with a friend.
In app camera, Task-Oriented: Scroll down to access the camera settings and change the resolution to the highest available option.
In app camera, Cancel the 'Make it your map' operation and return to the 'Select a place' screen.
In app camera, Task-Oriented: Share a photo taken just now from the camera to Google Maps by allowing the app to take pictures and record video while using the app.
In app camera, Task-Oriented: Post the image shared from the camera by first selecting the image and then posting it.
In app camera, Skip the sign-in process and explore the map features without logging in.
In app camera, Share the two selected images by clicking the 'Post' button in the upper right corner.
In app camera, Skip the sign-in process and then allow the app to access photos and videos on this device, then post a picture.
In app camera, Share the photo 'Shared from Camera' to a specific location by selecting a place and posting it.
In app camera, Skip the sign-in process and proceed to use the map without signing in.
In app camera, Take a picture of the house and then share it.
In app camera, Task-Oriented: Open the camera app and switch to video recording mode.
In app camera, Task-Oriented: Take a photo using the rear camera with the flash enabled.
In app camera, Task-Oriented: Zoom in on an object using the camera's zoom feature and then take a picture.
In app camera, take a photo using the rear camera and save it.
In app camera, switch to video mode, record a short video, and then play it back within the app.
In app camera, access the settings menu and change the photo resolution to the highest available setting.
